snippet: The Treasury Department said on Wednesday that the deficit for January stood at $17.5 billion compared with $10.3 billion a year ago.
abstract: Treasury Dept reports federal deficit in January was $17.5 billion, 6.2 percent increase from $10.3 billion year ago.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said on Wednesday that the deficit for January stood at $17.5 billion compared with $10.3 billion a year ago.

headline.main: Federal Deficit in January Higher Than a Year Ago
headline.print_headline: Federal Deficit in January Higher Than a Year Ago
